sourcesContent:
const policyData = [
  {
    title: 'General Information',
    content:
      'At La Flora Boutique, we are committed to delivering fresh, exquisite floral arrangements that' +
      ' brighten your special moments. We understand that sometimes issues may arise, and we want to ensure you' +
      ' have a clear understanding of our refund, replacement, and cancellation policies. Our goal is to provide' +
      ' fair solutions and exceptional customer care.',
  },
  {
    title: 'Eligibility for Refunds and Replacements',
    content:
      'Due to the highly perishable nature of fresh flowers and seasonal availability, refunds and' +
      ' replacements are only offered under the following specific conditions:\n \n ' +
      ' • Damaged or Wilted Flowers: If your bouquet arrives damaged, wilted, significantly lacking freshness,' +
      ' or noticeably different from the product description or images shown on our website.\n' +
      ' • Incorrect Order: If you receive the wrong flowers or items that differ from your confirmed order.\n' +
      ' • Failed Delivery: If your order was not delivered on the agreed date and time without prior notification.\n \n' +
      'Please note:\n \n' +
      ' • Refunds or replacements will not be granted for change of mind, late cancellations, or minor natural' +
      ' variations in flower color, size, or arrangement due to seasonal availability.\n' +
      ' •  Once an order is processed (usually within 2 hours), cancellations and changes are no longer allowed. \n' +
      ' • Personalized or custom orders are not eligible for refunds unless there is an issue covered above. \n',
  },
  {
    title: 'How to Request a Refund or Replacement',
    content:
      'To ensure a smooth resolution, please follow these steps: \n\n' +
      ' • Contact Us Within 48 Hours: Please notify our Customer Service team via phone, email, or contact form' +
      ' within 48 hours of receiving your order to report any issues.\n' +
      ' • Provide Details: Include your order number, contact information, and a detailed explanation of the issue.\n' +
      ' • Attach Photos: Clear, well-lit photos showing the damage, incorrect items, or other problems are ' +
      'required to quickly and accurately process your claim.\n \n' +
      'Our team will review your submission and respond within 1-2 business days to discuss the next steps.',
  },
  {
    title: 'Refund and Replacement Process',
    content:
      'Once your claim is approved:\n \n' +
      ' • Replacement: We will arrange a replacement bouquet or product as soon as possible, at no extra cost.\n' +
      ' • Refund: If a replacement is not feasible, we will promptly issue a full refund to your original payment method within 7 business days of approval.\n' +
      ' • Offline Payments: For cash or offline payments, alternative refund arrangements will be made with you.\n',
  },
  {
    title: 'Delivery Issues',
    content:
      ' • Missed Delivery: If delivery fails due to incorrect address or no recipient available, please contact us immediately. We may offer redelivery at an additional cost.\n' +
      ' • Delayed Delivery: While we strive for punctual delivery, unforeseen circumstances like weather or traffic may cause delays. We communicate proactively in such cases.',
  },
  {
    title: 'Care Instructions',
    content:
      ' • To ensure your flowers stay fresh longer, please follow our care instructions provided with each bouquet. Improper care is not covered under the refund policy.\n',
  },
  {
    title: 'Privacy and Security',
    content:
      ' • Your personal and payment information is handled securely and confidentially.\n' +
      ' • Refunds are processed in compliance with applicable privacy laws.\n',
  },
  {
    title: 'Contact Us',
    content:
      'If you have any questions about our Refund Policy or your order, please contact us:\n\n' +
      ' • Phone: +1 (213) 555-0198\n' +
      ' • Email: hello@laflora.com\n \n' +
      'We appreciate your trust in La Flora Boutique and are committed to making your experience exceptional.',
  },
];
export default policyData;
